Name: Meredith Sheppard
Response: The peanut salsa is very delicious and refreshing. It has changed the way I view food! (Delicious food does not equal to unhealthy food)

Name: Stef Foster
Response: As a mom I am always looking into what is best for my kids and the peanut salsa is a family favorite and I don't feel guilty as it is packed with nutrients

Name: Amy Peralta
Response: This is a great snack, I enjoy eating it with crackers, tortilla chips or even by itself! It is a staple in my household as it is loved by my whole family

Name: Teddy Altman
Response: I am obsessed with products from Simply Crisp, all of their products are packed with nutrients and they are very delicious
